snippet.title: Horn-Pacquiao rematch firming up
snippet.content:
THE rematch between Queensland world champ Jeff Horn and Manny Pacquiao is firming for November 12 at Suncorp Stadium. The Courier-Mail understands that while the Queensland Government is yet to sign on the dotted line, discussions are well advanced to hold the blockbuster rematch in Brisbane.
Aussie boxer Jeff Horn reveals the steep differences in lifestyle between he and Manny Pacquiao and discusses the diet he's taken on before the big fight. Courtesy: Fox Sports
Jeff Horn and Manny Pacquiao worlds apart Concerns had been raised about the ability of Brisbane to host an outdoor fight in the later months of the year, given the summer heat and the threat of storms. It's understood plans for the fight include bringing air-conditioners in to Suncorp.
